original_text: The next day after we left Caesarea, we arrived at Sidon. Julius was kind to Paul. He said, ‘Paul, you can go and visit your friends here. They can give you anything that you need.’
korean_text: 이튿날 시돈에 대니 율리오가 바울을 친절히 대하여 친구들에게 가서 대접 받기를 허락하더니

sentences.original_text: The next day after we left Caesarea
Paul, you can go and visit your friends here
sentences.korean_translation: 바울, 당신은 여기서 친구들을 만나러 갈 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: They can give you anything that you need
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 당신이 필요한 모든 것을 줄 수 있습니다
